alert.note: Alert for Carroll (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 03 at 11:58PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Carroll and northern Heard Counties through 1230 AM EDT... At 1158 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Ephesus, or 12 miles northeast of Wedowee, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, pea sized hail and frequent cloud to ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Carrollton, Bowdon, Mount Zion, Ephesus, Centralhatchee, Roopville, Tyus, Roosterville, Frolona, Abilene, John Tanner State Park, Lowell, Plant Wansley and Blackjack Mountain. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
